title: Fix missing Log out button in Manager and Operator profile pages

requirements.text: Ensure the Manager Profile and Operator Profile pages always show a clearly visible "Log out" button and that it successfully signs the user out and returns them to the /login page.

quotes: Yes working but the log out button is not there in manager and operator profile

acceptanceCriteria: When navigating to /manager/profile (as a Manager/Admin), a clearly visible "Log out" button is present on the page without relying on the header dropdown.
When navigating to /operator/profile (as an authenticated Operator), a clearly visible "Log out" button is present on the page without relying on the header dropdown.
Clicking the profile page "Log out" button clears the credential session (and any admin token state), clears the React Query cache, and navigates to /login.
The "Log out" button remains visible and usable on both desktop and mobile layouts (no hidden/overflowed button in narrow widths).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything in frontend/src/components/ui (immutable paths).
Keep logout behavior centralized via the existing frontend/src/hooks/useAppLogout.ts logic (no duplicate logout implementations).
nonGoals: Changing authentication mechanisms or role logic.
Adding new profile fields or changing profile data models.
